mapper.insert: insert into cs_touchup_statistics (N_ID, PRODUCT, TOUCHUP_NUM, SUCCESS_NUM, FAIL_NUM, UNTREATED_NUM, `OPERATOR`, STR0, STR1, COMP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODI_BY, MODI_TIME, ORG_ID, SORT_NUM, `STATUS`) values (#{nId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{product,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{touchupNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{successNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{failNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{untreatedNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{str0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{str1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modiBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modiTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update cs_touchup_statistics set PRODUCT = #{product,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TOUCHUP_NUM = #{touchupNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUCCESS_NUM = #{successNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FAIL_NUM = #{failNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNTREATED_NUM = #{untreatedNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `OPERATOR` = #{operator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STR0 = #{str0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR1 = #{str1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODI_BY = #{modiBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MODI_TIME = #{modiTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SORT_NUM = #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where N_ID = #{nId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select N_ID, PRODUCT, TOUCHUP_NUM, SUCCESS_NUM, FAIL_NUM, UNTREATED_NUM, `OPERATOR`, STR0, STR1, COMP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODI_BY, MODI_TIME, ORG_ID, SORT_NUM, `STATUS` from cs_touchup_statistics where N_ID = #{nId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select N_ID, PRODUCT, TOUCHUP_NUM, SUCCESS_NUM, FAIL_NUM, UNTREATED_NUM, `OPERATOR`, STR0, STR1, COMP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODI_BY, MODI_TIME, ORG_ID, SORT_NUM, `STATUS` from cs_touchup_statistics
